ObjectClass.Name: Gargantuan
ObjectClass.Description:
GARGANTUAN: Ultra fast biological carrier aircraft Self healing [+3/s]; Superb blockade-runner
No weapons; Repairs carried units Can mass produce base-class

Objective.Name: Make 3 Octos
Objective.Details: Biological melee shock trooper\Very effective against ground targets\Good at absorbing enemy fire\Morphs into R.P or Dome\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Make 3 Sepis
Objective.Details: Biological light support specialist\Powerful against air units\Morphs into Mound or Reaph\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Make 3 Pharos
Objective.Details: Biological anti light-armor grenadier\Slow tough close-range fire support\Cloak detector\Morphs into Spyre or Arcticus\Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander
